Detailed Description

Controller class for HTTP errors.

Project EmeRails - Codename Ocarina

© 2008 Claudio Procida http://www.emeraldion.it

ErrorController is responsible for handling HTTP errors. Feel free to improve this class by adding your custom error handling code.
